text: Tharsis is a village that is part of the Alosno municipality in the province of Huelva, Spain. According to the 2013 census, the village has a population of 1,840 inhabitants. ==Mining== Tharsis is a mining town where the Filón Sur Mine, known for its fine goethite specimens, is located. ===Filon Sur Mine=== {| |- valign="top" |160px |thumb |The Lagunazo |} ==See also== *Alosno ==References== ==External links== * *Amigos de Tharsis Category:Populated places in the Province of Huelva
title: Tharsis, Huelva
